text: Michel Jourdan (born 1926) is a retired French film actor.Goble p.350 ==Selected filmography== * The Passenger (1949) * Ils étaient cinq (1952) * At the Edge of the City (1953) * Burning Fuse (1957) * The Cat (1958) * The Cat Shows Her Claws (1960) == References == == Bibliography == * Goble, Alan.
